languages.text: "Просто прекрасно! Раньше меня обвиняли в колдовстве, а теперь — в том, что я вызываю у ксеносов бешенство! Слушай, тощий, просто держись от меня подальше, ладно?"
"That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"
languages.original_text: "Просто прекрасно! Раньше меня обвиняли в колдовстве, а теперь — в том, что я вызываю у ксеносов бешенство! Слушай, тощий, просто держись от меня подальше, ладно?"

traits.locale_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我的天，这可真是太棒了！先是大家说我操纵巫术，现在就连异形发狂也要算到我头上来了！离我远点好吗，你这只竹节虫异形？”
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: “我的天，这可真是太棒了！先是大家说我操纵巫术，现在就连异形发狂也要算到我头上来了！离我远点好吗，你这只竹节虫异形？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Génial ! Avant, on m'accusait de sorcellerie, et maintenant, on me reproche de faire perdre la tête aux xénos ! Restez loin de moi, l'insecte, compris ? »
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: « Génial ! Avant, on m'accusait de sorcellerie, et maintenant, on me reproche de faire perdre la tête aux xénos ! Restez loin de moi, l'insecte, compris ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist ja großartig! Erst bezichtigen sie mich der Hexerei, nun bezichtigen sie mich, Xenos Amok laufen zu lassen! Haltet Euch einfach fern von mir, Stabschrecke, ja?"
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ja großartig! Erst bezichtigen sie mich der Hexerei, nun bezichtigen sie mich, Xenos Amok laufen zu lassen! Haltet Euch einfach fern von mir, Stabschrecke, ja?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「素晴らしいじゃない！以前は魔術だと非難されたけど、今は異種族を凶暴化させたと非難されているんだもの！私に近づかないでちょうだい、ナナフシめ」
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしいじゃない！以前は魔術だと非難されたけど、今は異種族を凶暴化させたと非難されているんだもの！私に近づかないでちょうだい、ナナフシめ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ah, estupendo! Por si no tenía bastante con que me acusen de hechicería, ¡ahora resulta que también hago enloquecer a los xenos! Mira, bicharraco, aléjate de mí, ¿vale?».
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, estupendo! Por si no tenía bastante con que me acusen de hechicería, ¡ahora resulta que también hago enloquecer a los xenos! Mira, bicharraco, aléjate de mí, ¿vale?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

languages.text: "Şahane! Sahirlikle suçladıkları yetmedi, kabahatlerime bir de zenoları delirtmek eklendi! Benden uzak dur çomak böceği yeter, tamam mı?"
languages.original_text: "That's just fantastic! Before they accused me of sorcery, and now I'm being accused of making xenos go berserk! Just stay away from me, stick insect, all right?"

traits.locale_text: "Şahane! Sihirbazlıkla suçladıkları yetmedi, kabahatlerime bir de zenoları delirtmek eklendi! Benden uzak dur çomak böceği yeter, tamam mı?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
